attributes.action: Ban fireworks in West Lothian due to increased of firework attacks
attributes.additional_details: This is due to the increase of fireworks being used for racial attacks and police not being able to stop it when called
attributes.background: I want the government to ban fireworks in West Lothian due to them being used inappropriately and used for racial attacks

rejection.details:
Also possibly a devolved issue - and there is a petition already open on banning private use/ownership of fireworks more generally:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559

And there will be a debate in Westminster Hall on the above petition at 4.30pm on Monday 19 January.
